{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6215 |revision=SRg |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/07/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=True |availability=OEM |type=wireless router,print server |fcc_id=NDD9573580520 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R3210-X |cpu1_cspeed=133 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V28S40CTP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Edimax EW-7358Mg |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561S |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:0E:2E |oui_eth=00:0E:2E }} :[http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=197&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=21 Product page]
*[https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/EdimaxBR6215SRGV10APL Pictures] :"1244-00000416-01Z" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :"1244-00000486-02Z" is silkscreened on the main board.
The default SSID is presumably '''default'''. Probable OUI of 00:0E:2E. :See also [[Edimax BR-6315SRg]]..
